Action.UseTTSTextExpression: 远离中央，准备核爆分摊

Action.TriggerText: place:{"Type":3,"SecDisplay":${cvar:持续时间},"Range1":${cvar:外圈},"Range2":${cvar:内圈},"displaceTargetType":-1,"Pos1":{ "X":${posX},"Y":${posY},"Z":${posZ}},"alpha":${cvar:透明度},"Color":"${cvar:颜色1}","Color2":"${cvar:颜色2}","blendOperation":${cvar:叠加选项},"Outline":"${cvar:边框}"}

place:{"SecDisplay":${cvar:持续时间},"Range1":${cvar:半径},"displaceTargetType":-1,"Pos1":{ "X":${posX},"Y":${posY},"Z":${posZ}},"alpha":${cvar:透明度},"Color":"${cvar:颜色1}","Color2":"${cvar:颜色2}","blendOperation":${cvar:叠加选项},"Outline":"${cvar:边框}"}

place:{"Type":2,"SecDisplay":${cvar:持续时间},"Range1":${cvar:长度},"Range2":${cvar:宽度},"targetType":3,"Dir":${numeric:${heading}/pi*180},"Pos1":{ "X":${posX},"Y":${posY},"Z":${posZ}},"displaceTargetType":-1,"alpha":${cvar:透明度},"Color":"${cvar:颜色1}","Color2":"${cvar:颜色2}","blendOperation":${cvar:叠加选项},"Outline":"${cvar:边框}"}

place:{"Type":1,"SecDisplay":${cvar:持续时间},"Range1":${cvar:长度},"Range2":${cvar:角度},"targetType":3,"Dir":${numeric:${heading}/pi*180},"Pos1":{ "X":${posX},"Y":${posY},"Z":${posZ}},"displaceTargetType":-1,"alpha":${cvar:透明度},"Color":"${cvar:颜色1}","Color2":"${cvar:颜色2}","blendOperation":${cvar:叠加选项},"Outline":"${cvar:边框}"}

place:{"Type":2,"SecDisplay":${cvar:持续时间},"Range1":${cvar:长度},"Range2":${cvar:宽度},"targetType":3,"Dir":${numeric:${heading}/pi*180},"Pos1":{ "X":${posX},"Y":${posY},"Z":${posZ}},"displaceTargetType":-1,"alpha":${cvar:透明度},"Color":"${cvar:颜色1}","Color2":"${cvar:颜色2}","blendOperation":${cvar:叠加选项},"Outline":"${cvar:边框}"}
